content: निपातः {@--1@} Falling or coming down, descending, alighting; पयोधरोत्सेधनिपातचूर्णिताः <ls>Ku. 5. 24</ls>; <ls>Rs. 5. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Attacking, falling upon, a spring, leap; <ls>R. 2. 60.</ls> {@--3@} Casting, hurling, discharging; <ls>Ku. 3. 15.</ls> {@--4@} Descent, fall; निशितनिपाताः शराः <ls>Ś. 1. 10.</ls> {@--5@} Dying, death; <ls>Ms. 6. 31.</ls> {@--6@} Accidental occurrence or mention. {@--7@} An irregular form, irregularity, putting down as irregular or exceptional; एते निपाताः, निपातोयं &c. {@--8@} A particle, an indeclinable; see <ls>P. I. 4. 56.</ls> {@--9@} The opposite extremity, the lower end.
